snippet: The jazz musicians Ben Wendel and Dan Tepfer are releasing their first album as a duo, “Small Constructions,” which includes original compositions along with a songbook standard, a Handel variation and choice material by Thelonious Monk and...
abstract: Excerpt from conversation with jazz musicians Ben Wendel and Dan Tepfer, who discuss release of their first album as a duo and how they get along on tour.
lead_paragraph: The jazz musicians Ben Wendel and Dan Tepfer are releasing their first album as a duo, “Small Constructions,” which includes original compositions along with a songbook standard, a Handel variation and choice material by Thelonious Monk and Lennie Tristano.

headline.seo: Ben Wendel and Dan Tepfer on ‘New Constructions’ Jazz Album
headline.main: Sons of Opera Moms Go Far Afield
headline.print_headline: Sons of Opera Moms Go Far Afield
